content.rendered:
Directed by Umang Vyas

Written by Vivek Bele. Uttam Gada. Aditya Rawal

Star Paresh Rawal (Manubhai Joshi). Manasi Parekh (Alka Joshi). Chetan Dhanani (Ajay Mankad)

Language Gujarati

Producers Sanchita Chatarjee. Sanchita Chatterjee. Kunal Dhanani. Ganesh Jain. Ratan Jain. Hari Khirade. Swaroop Sampat. Pratik Kewal Shah

Production Venus Films
